text: Ahh nice! Have you got it to hand so I can take a look?  What kind of stuff were you removing? What approach did you take for removing stuff?

Also having some really good prep techniques in your show reel will be a god send when you are applying for jobs. When I did my final project when I was at uni I did a project that involved preping out people body parts for that specific reason, that I would then have some prep on my reel. If your looking to get into Comp having a solid base in roto and prep techniques are a really good way to get your foot in the door aswell as have a base to learn other techniques ontop of.
